ParticleCannons



作者原文
Particle Cannons is a fun plugin that adds "particle cannons" to the game. When a player right clicks with the cannon item and with enough ammunition, there will be a line of explosions, destroying blocks in front of the player and adding a whole new level of strategy to PvP.This can be a very powerful weapon in PvP, as you can damage players greatly from a distance, launch them into the air to take fall damage, or launch yourself away to escape. To balance this I have made the default items hard to get and it will cost one diamond per shot of the cannon by default.All items and the range of the cannon are configurable using the commands or in the config file.

replies.txt_content: 很無聊又簡單的一個插件 可以在大堂遊玩這個喔

Particle Cannons是一款给原版Minecraft 添加粒子大炮的有趣插件。当一位玩家有足够的弹药，并右键加浓物品，会发射一条粒子射线摧毁你前方的方块，这也能被用于PVP。
这是个PVP神器，你能享受当光头哥的快感，也可以对地喷射享受忍者降落，还能回头放屁甩身走人。为了体现贫富差距，默认弹药被我魔鬼的设置为一个钻石。
这个插件允许你编辑任何物品为枪，并且你可以通过命令或修改配置来制作不同的粒子大炮。
